select userId,sex,nickname from user where userId = #{id}

select user.nickname,user.userId,user.sex,user.birthday,user.address,user.phone,user.signature,friendrelation.note,friendrelation.groupname,friendrelation.evaluate from user,friendrelation where user.userId in (select friendId from friendrelation where userId = #{userId}) and friendrelation.userId = #{userId} and friendrelation.friendId = user.userId
select groupname,count_num from friendgroup where userId = #{id}
select count(*) from friendrelation where userId = #{userId} and friendId=#{friendId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM friendrelation WHERE userId = #{userId} AND friendId=#{friendId};
